name: KONAMI KRAZY RACERS (Wii U)
description:
Choose from 12 of your favorite Konami characters, all with unique
racing abilities. Speed your way through 16 action-packed, fun-filled
courses. Collect coins to upgrade your car, unlock hidden courses, and
race by your opponents on your way to the checkered flag.
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
